contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox_Disease | Name = {{PAGENAME}} | Image = | Caption = | DiseasesDB = | ICD10 = | ICD9 = | ICDO = | OMIM = 609452 | MedlinePlus = | eMedicineSubj = | eMedicineTopic = | MeshID = | }} '''Zaspopathy''',<ref>{{cite journal |pmid=17337483 |doi=10.1093/brain/awm006 |year=2007 |month=Jun |author=Griggs R, Vihola A, Hackman P, Talvinen K, Haravuori H, Faulkner G, Eymard B, Richard I, Selcen D, Engel A, Carpen O, Udd B |title=Zaspopathy in a large classic late-onset distal myopathy family |volume=130 |issue=Pt 6 |pages=1477–1484 |journal=Brain : a journal of neurology |url=http://brain.oxfordjournals.org/cgi/pmidlookup?view=long&pmid=17337483 |format=Free full text}}</ref> also called '''ZASP-related myofibril myopathy''',<ref>{{OMIM|609452}}</ref> is a novel [[autosomal]] [[dominance (genetics)|dominant]]<ref name=z05>{{cite journal |pmid=15668942 |doi=10.1002/ana.20376 |url=http://www3.interscience.wiley.com/cgi-bin/abstract/109873262/ABSTRACT?CRETRY=1&SRETRY=0 |year=2005 |month=Feb |author=Selcen D, Engel AG |title=Mutations in ZASP define a novel form of muscular dystrophy in humans |volume=57 |issue=2 |pages=269–276 |journal=Annals of neurology}}</ref> form of progressive [[muscular dystrophy]], first described in 2005. The disease encompasses multiple forms of both distal and proximal myopathies, and is caused by [[mutation]]s in the [[gene]] referred to as ZASP.<ref name=z05/> ==Pathophysiology== [[Image:Autosomal dominant - en.svg|thumb|right|{{PAGENAME}} has an autosomal dominant pattern of [[inheritance]].]] The ZASP gene is located at [[chromosome 10]], and encodes a so-called [[Z-disk-associated protein]]. Mutation in this protein causes disintergration of the Z-disk of contractile elements ([[myofibril]]s) in muscle cells. Mutations of several other Z-disk related proteins, such as [[desmin]], [[alfa-B-crystallin]] and [[myotilin]] can cause disorders similar to zaspopathy. ==References== {{reflist}} == See also == * {{OMIM|605906|LIM DOMAIN-BINDING 3; LDB3}} (gene) {{Diseases of myoneural junction and muscle}} [[Category:Autosomal dominant disorders]] [[Category:Rare diseases]] [[Category:Myoneural junction and neuromuscular diseases]] {{disease-stub}}
